div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 420 Skudljivac, Lesina, Dalmatia, Yugo- (985) slavia, 1867 Burial: 4th cent. B.C. ? (T) Contents: c. 92 AE Heracleia, Illyria: 29 Pharos: 60 Unc.: 3 (ΔΙ above goat) Disposition: formerly Nuber coll., Esseg Kubirschek, BollArchStoriaDalmatia (1897), pp. 159-71
